text: Candice Swanepoel is back in a bikini after giving birth to her second child on June 19. The Victoria's Secret beauty proudly displayed her post - baby figure as she hit the beach in Brazil on Friday - less than three weeks after welcoming son Ariel. She looked fantastic as she modeled an off - the - shoulder TRIANGL bikini top with tie detail and some red polka - dot briefs.
